meta.title: Freelance Web Developer
meta.description: Trilingual freelance web developer based in Warsaw, Poland. Specialized in React/NEXT, Vue/NUXT, MongoDB, and NodeJS.

about.title: Ambitious Programmer
about.desc:
My name is Daniel Ladeira and I am a trilingual developer based in Warsaw, Poland.

I started my coding journey when I was 11 years old coding Minecraft mods and plugins and from there branched out into other fields of Software Development. Fast-forward a couple years and now I'm building full-stack web applications with fastest and newest technologies on the market such as React and Vue.

projects.title: Project Showcase
projects.project1: A production ready, SEO optimized Minecraft server statistics website. Project showcases good use of space and hierarchy to present a lot of information using a modern dark mode dashboard design.
projects.project2: A calendar application use for time tracking. Minimalist and light-theme design aimed at solving a very specific problem, what am I spending too much and too little time on?
projects.project3: A simple cooking website showcasing proficiency in using React and hooking it up with a custom built API server. Focus was placed on the back end and good code practices using React.

services.title: Pricing & Services

service1.name: Simple Website
service1.desc:
A fast and reliant website with 3 pages included.

No logging in or dynamic data (loaded from 3rd party servers). Website updates are manually done by the owner.

service2.name: Dynamic Website
service2.desc:
A semi-complex and optimized website with 5 pages included.

Allows for simple login systems and loading data from 3rd parties. Website updates are manually done by the owner.

service3.name: Basic Web App
service3.desc:
A complex website with 6 pages included.

Supports login systems and loading data from 3rd parties. Hosting and a control panel to facilitate changes are included.

service4.name: Complex Web App
service4.desc:
A SEO optimized and performant website with 7 pages included.

Supports complex login systems and storing large amounts of user data. Hosting and a control panel to facilitate changes are included.

services.disclaimer1: All prices are just estimates, for actual quotes

2.question: 2. Website Complexity
2.question_help:
How complex the website is

Basic - No complicated features required and no data is loaded from 3rd parties

Semi-Complex - Features take a bit of time to implement. Allows loading data from 3rd parties

Complex & Optimized - The features are difficult to implement and speed is crucial

3.question: 3. Authentication
3.question_help:
How users login

None - Users cannot login

Email & Password - Users can login using their email and password

Social Media - Users can login using 3rd party services (Google, Instagram, Facebook)

4.question: 4. Hosting
4.question_help:
How the website is rendered on the internet

Not included - You host the website yourself, I give you the code for everything and tell you how to set it up

Included - I host the website on my servers and you don't have to worry about setting anything up (monthly cost included, calculated based on website popularity and application complexity)

5.question: 5. Website Updates
5.question_help:
How content on the website is changed

None - You make the necessary changes to the codebase yourself to change the values that you want to change

On Request - You tell me what you want to be changed on the website and I will change it (monthly fee)

Control Panel - I will build a dedicated control panel for administrators to make it easy for you to make large changes on the website without any coding experience (expensive and requires Basic Backend Type)

contact.hint: A confirmation message will be sent to your email to verify ownership

sent.title: Email sent!
sent.subtitle: I will get back to you within 48 hours

verify.title: One last step!
verify.subtitle: Please click the confirmation link that was just sent to your email. If you don't click it nothing will be sent to me!
